alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:01AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pine and southwestern Burnett Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 300 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rush City, or 9 miles south of Pine City, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Branstad around 310 AM CDT. Grantsburg around 315 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Webster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
